trans-unit.source: Represents a civic address.
trans-unit.target: 表示市政地址。

trans-unit.source: A civic address can include fields such as street address, postal code, state/province, and country or region.
trans-unit.target: 市政地址可以包括如街道地址、 邮政编码、 省自治区直辖市和国家 / 地区的字段。

trans-unit.source: A civic address for a location can be obtained from a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> by using a class that implements <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver>.
trans-unit.target: 可以<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>通过使用的类，实现<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver>.</xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver></xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>从获取位置市政地址

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> class provides a default implementation that returns the civic address that corresponds to a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>, if the location source provides both coordinate data as well as civic address data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver>类提供的默认实现返回对应于市政地址<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>，如果定位源同时提供了坐标数据，以及市政地址数据。</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> </xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> returns a CivicAddress for the current location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A>返回用于当前位置 CivicAddress。</xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the location source is unable to resolve the coordinate position to a civic address, <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果位置源是无法解析的坐标位置为市政地址<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown>返回。</xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: All fields are initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 所有字段都初始化为<xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> class using address information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref>类使用地址信息。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the first line of the street address.
trans-unit.target: 包含的街道地址的第一行的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the second line of the street address.
trans-unit.target: 包含的街道地址的第二行的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the building name or number.
trans-unit.target: 包含生成名称或数字的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the city.
trans-unit.target: 包含城市的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the country or region.
trans-unit.target: 包含的国家或地区的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the floor number.
trans-unit.target: 包含楼层号的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the postal code.
trans-unit.target: 包含邮政编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the state or province.
trans-unit.target: 包含的州或省份的字符串。

trans-unit.source: At least one parameter must be a non-empty string.
trans-unit.target: 至少一个参数必须为非空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first line of the address.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置地址的第一行。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first line of the address.
trans-unit.target: 返回地址的第一行。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，将返回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the second line of the address.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置地址的第二行。

trans-unit.source: Returns the second line of the address.
trans-unit.target: 返回地址的第二行。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String.Empty.>
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，将返回<xref:System.String.Empty.></xref:System.String.Empty.>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the building name or number.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置建筑物名称或编号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the building name or number.
trans-unit.target: 返回建筑物名称或编号。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，将返回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the city.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将其所在城市的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the city.
trans-unit.target: 返回将其所在城市的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，将返回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the country or region of the location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的国家或地区的位置。

trans-unit.source: The country or region is typically represented by a two-letter ISO-3166 country code.
trans-unit.target: 两个字母 ISO&3166; 国家/地区代码通常表示的国家或地区。

trans-unit.source: Returns the country or region code.
trans-unit.target: 返回的国家或地区代码。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，将返回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the floor level of the location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的位置的楼层级别。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the floor level.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，包含 floor 级别。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，将返回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> contains data.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref>包含数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> is equal to <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> is equal to <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the postal code of the location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位置的邮政编码。

trans-unit.source: Returns the postal code of the location.
trans-unit.target: 返回位置的邮政编码。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，将返回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the state or province of the location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的州或省份的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the state or province of the location.
trans-unit.target: 返回的州或省份的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，将返回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> that contains no data.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref>不包含任何数据。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.IsUnknown%2A> to verify whether a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> contains data.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.IsUnknown%2A>以验证是否<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress>包含数据。</xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> </xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.IsUnknown%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
